donations.donation_comment: Proud of the truckers working to protect our freedom!  Godspeed!!
Thank you! Truckers. I'm proud of you. You make me feel proud of Canada. You are light of freedom. Thank you!
Free people of the world - it is time to stand.  With the grace and help of God we WILL be victorious.  All honor and glory to God Almighty.
Canadian Truckers are our freedom fighters, and I am so proud of them. You are the world's hero's. Keep on Trucking 🇨🇦❤️🇨🇦

Cost a bit more in American funds but it is for a cause i strongly beleive in Being on a fixed income (my government capped pensions) with pets to tend too along with wanting to show my support. I cant go to Ottawa, this and local convorys is best i can do. Did phone the govenor generals secutary in ottawa was on the phone waiting for over 3 hrs I put in a vote of non confidence against trudeau an

Dear Canadian government, you all need to be executed if you backed the vaccine mandates. You are guilty of crimes against humanity and the Nuremberg Code to which your nation is a signatory. I look forward to the day you tyrants are swinging from a noose. Furthermore my name is my property and any use of my name by any agent of the Canadian government requires a $500,000 USD. Notice served.

Freedom is  the only way !!!
Truck on and thank you ♥️
Prayers to all the truckers.  Thank you so very much.
